section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Confined space" means a space that, by design:
has limited openings for entry and exit; and
is subject to:
"Maintenance work" means cleaning, inspection, maintenance, painting, repair, servicing, or other similar work.

text.section:
A person described in § 5-101(d)(2)(ii) or (iii) of this title may not allow or cause an individual described in § 5-101(c)(2)(iii) or (iv) of this title to do maintenance work in a confined space, unless the Commissioner:
grants written authorization based on a satisfactory showing that work practices in effect will protect the health and safety of the individual; or
in accordance with Subtitle 3 of this title, passes an order for a variance.

section.section: This subsection applies only to an employer who is a subcontractor.

Each subcontractor who, under an original contract or subcontract, is to do maintenance work in a confined space shall give the Commissioner:
at the commencement of the maintenance work, oral notice of the maintenance work to be performed; and
within 24 hours after the oral notice, written notice of the maintenance work.
